title: Google and Apple partner to power Siri with Gemini AI
description: Google's Gemini artificial intelligence models and cloud computing will serve as the new base for Apple's Foundation Models.

title: Council to embrace generative artificial intelligence but with great care
description: 'It can do amazing things,' says council leader Linda Evans
content:

title: An AI-driven strategy to accelerate microbial gene function discovery
description: We know the genes, but not their functions—to resolve this long-standing bottleneck in microbial research, a joint research team has proposed a cutting-edge research strategy that leverages artificial intelligence (AI) to drastically accelerate the discovery of microbial gene functions.

title: These Experts Like a Pair of Stocks With AI-Driven Shopping a 'Major 2026 Theme'
description: Artificial intelligence stands to transform online shopping as consumers know it, presenting revenue upside for fintech companies.
content:

title: Meta Plans to Cut 10% to 15% of Employees in Reality Labs Business
description: The layoffs are set to be announced this week and would affect Meta’s work on the metaverse, as the company spends heavily on building artificial intelligence.

title: Apple Teams Up With Google for A.I. in Its Products
description: Apple was facing increasing questions about its plans for artificial intelligence as other big tech companies invested tens of billions in the technology.
content:
